scroll-offset.description: Scroll offset (in pixels) from which point the component is shown on page; Measured from the top of the page (or from the bottom if in 'reverse' mode)
scroll-offset.description_zh: 滚动偏移量（以像素为单位），从该点开始组件在页面上显示;从页面顶部开始测量（如果处于“反向”模式，则从底部开始测量）

reverse.description: Work in reverse (shows when scrolling to the top of the page and scrolls to bottom when triggered)
reverse.description_zh: 反向工作（滚动到页面顶部时显示，触发时滚动到底部）

duration.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the scrolling until it reaches its target
duration.description_zh: 滚动到达到目标的持续时间（以毫秒为单位）
